data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Lima, Peru to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lima, Peru

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 1,221,907 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.section_summary: On average, 13 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Lima, Peru.
data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself real to these new families.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Lima, Peru to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Lima to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who are far from you in Lima. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 1,221,907 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Lima, Peru to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

location.name: Lima
location.cities_list: Huaral, Huacho, Barranca, Nuevo Imperial, Imperial
location.cities_list_w_pop: Huaral (62,174), Huacho (54,545), Barranca (46,290), Nuevo Imperial (32,344), Imperial (32,344)
